mapper.sql: USER_ID, CREATE_TIME, EMAIL, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_NUM, LOGIN_TIME, OLD_LOGIN_IP, OLG_LOGIN_TIME, PICK_NAME, ROLE_ID, SALT, SIGNATURE, STATE, UPDATE_TIME, USER_ICON, USER_PHONE, USER_PWD
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user (CREATE_TIME, EMAIL, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_NUM, LOGIN_TIME, OLD_LOGIN_IP, OLG_LOGIN_TIME, PICK_NAME, ROLE_ID, SALT, SIGNATURE, STATE, UPDATE_TIME, USER_ICON, USER_PHONE, USER_PWD) values (#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oldLoginIp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{olgLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userIcon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update user
USER_ID = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMAIL = #{record.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LOGIN_IP = #{record.loginIp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOGIN_NUM = #{record.loginNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

OLD_LOGIN_IP = #{record.oldLoginIp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OLG_LOGIN_TIME = #{record.olgLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

SIGNATURE = #{record.signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

USER_PHONE = #{record.userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USER_PWD = #{record.userPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
